definition: table of scores (in exams or sports league)

to amass/to accumulate/to store/measured quantity (such as area of volume)/product (the result of multiplication)/to integrate (math.)/to solve (or integrate) an ordinary differential equation (math.)/old/long-standing

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
notice or announcement/list of names/public roll of successful examinees

sentences.english: The Biancocelesti are the runaway leaders at the top of Serie A and confidence is high at Formello.
sentences.chinese: 目前拉齊奧正在積分榜上領跑，球隊信心十足。

sentences.english: Lyon slipped to third place, three points behind PSG.
sentences.chinese: 馬賽滑落至積分榜中游，7分落後第三名里爾。

sentences.english: This team ranks first on the tally with an undefeated record.
sentences.chinese: 這支球隊以不敗的戰績雄居積分榜首。

sentences.english: They are sitting there pretty comfortable in the league in ninth position.
sentences.chinese: 他們現在在積分榜第九的位置上呆的挺舒服的。

sentences.english: Chelsea's blistering form makes the task of overhauling their five-point lead formidable.
sentences.chinese: 切爾西的狀態大勇，現在在積分榜上領先5分。

sentences.english: Now we are in a good position in the Premiership and in the Champions League.
sentences.chinese: 我們現在在積分榜上位置很好。

sentences.english: Our on line lives are just twists on the videogame leaderboards.
sentences.chinese: 我們的在線生活只是遊戲積分榜上的起起伏伏。

sentences.english: His marks top the tally. He must be the champion.
sentences.chinese: 他的成績雄踞積分榜第一名，冠軍非他莫屬。

definition: Salt Lake City, capital of Utah

pinyin: Ma3 si1 te4 li3 he4 te4

definition: Rostov-on-Don, Russian river port and regional capital close to Sea of Azov (north of the Black Sea)
White Guard or White Movement, anti-communist troops fighting against the Bolsheviks during the Russian Civil War (1917-1922)
to face an attack/to repulse the enemy
to win by a narrow margin/to barely win/narrow victory
